creator: prasad.subramanian@sun.com
text:
When a jsp:include is used in a JSP page , the contents of included page is not displayed .This happens only on WIndows XP. This is one of the JSPs that fail: ***************************************************************************** Test22.jsp : using <jsp:include page="includeme.html" flush="true" /> (Relative Path)
Test Output
Test22.jsp : using <jsp:include page="includeme.html" flush="true" /> ( Relative Path ) to include a html file contents in this JSP page.

Content of "includeme.html"

***************************************************************************** The output does not contain the contents of "includeme.html" This works fine on win2k.
